title: FIFA World Cup : Number of goals scored at each tournament 1930 to 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of goals scored for 21 number of Countriess.
Countries Brazil 2014 has the highest Number of goals scored and Italy 1934 has the lowest Number of goals scored.
The lowest value at Countries Italy 1934 is 2.44x times less than the highest value at Brazil 2014.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Countries in the x axis and Number of goals scored in the y axis.
Countries Brazil 2014 has the highest Number of goals scored and Italy 1934 has the lowest Number of goals scored.
The second highest Number of goals scored is appeared to be the Countries France 1998.
The maximum Countries Brazil 2014 has got 2.44 times higher Number of goals scored than the minimum Countries Italy 1934.
Countries Brazil 2014 is higher than any other Countriess with value 171.0, followed by France 1998, and Russia 2018. Down to Countries Italy 1934 with the lowest value 70.0.
Countries Brazil 2014, and France 1998 have a similar Number of goals scored that is 171.0.
